bwwExcerpt: Elaine Stritch once visited Nathan Lane backstage at the "Addams Family" musical and famously told him, "They're not paying you enough." They're not paying Alex Brightman enough to star in the ghost ship of a new musical called "Beetlejuice," which opened Thursday at Broadway's Winter Garden Theatre to mark the unfortunate end of the 2018-19 Broadway season.
